content: Create comprehensive type definitions for dashboard data (chores, rewards, family members)
Set up React Query hooks for dashboard API integration
Create Supabase real-time subscription hooks for live updates
Build FamilyOverview section with member cards, points, and family stats
Implement MyTasks section with role-based chore management (children vs parents)
Build RewardsSection with redemption functionality and parent approval workflow
Create interactive components (chore completion, reward redemption, approval flows)
Replace mock dashboard with real data integration and API calls
Test real-time updates and optimistic UI updates
